Package edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.mancala.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.mancala.model.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A Game object represents a single mancala game between two players. Currently incomplete due to GUI and network problems needed to solve first

        public void reset()
        Resets board to starting format

      • getGameState

        public Message getGameState()
        Gives a Message containing info about the number of marbles in each hole, whether the current player changed and the changed current player The index of the array corresponds with the index of the Hole
        Returns:
        Message with array of marbles counts

      • sow

        public void sow​(int index)
         throws MancalaException
        Given an index of a Hole, sows that Hole
        Parameters:
        index - index of Hole to sow
        Throws:
        MancalaException

      • sow

        public boolean sow​(Hole hole,
                   Store playerStore)
            throws MancalaException
        Places all marbles in\ selected hole into the next holes and stores according to mancala's rules.
        Parameters:
        hole - the hole to take the marbles from
        playerStore - the Store corresponding to the hole being sown
        Returns:
        true if the last marble sowed ends in player's store (for free turn)
        Throws:
        MancalaException

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Accessor method for the Game's board
        Returns:
        the current Game Board

      • gameStatus

        public boolean gameStatus()
        Checks for the current game's running status
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value that's true if the game is over, false if the game is still going
